沇字的基本解释

沇
yǎn
〔沇水〕济水的别称，古河名，源出中国河南省，流经山东省入渤海。

沇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǎn］
［《廣韻》以轉切，上獮，以。］
(1)水名。济水的别称。发源于河南省济源县王屋山，至温县入黄河。又自荥泽复出黄河南，东流至山东省琅槐（今广饶县）入渤海。
(2)同“兖”。古州名。
(3)见“沇沇”。
[②]［wěi］
［《集韻》愈水切，上旨，以。］
见“沇2溶”。

沇字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　沇； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页610第04
〔古文〕沿【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?以轉切，音兗。水名。【說文】水出河東東垣王屋山。【書·禹貢】道沇水東流爲濟。【山海經】聮水西北流，注于秦澤。【註】聮衍聲相近，卽沇水也。【水經注】濟水逕原城南，東合北水，亂流東南注，分爲二水。一水東南流，俗謂之衍水，卽沇水也。　又沇沇，流行貌。【前漢·郊祀歌】沇沇四塞。　又與兗通。【甘氏星經】兗州作沇州。【前漢·天文志】角亢氐，沇州。　又【集韻】庾準切，音尹。義同。　又兪水切，唯上聲。沇溶，水流㵎谷中也。【司馬相如·上林賦】沇溶淫鬻。　【集韻】或从兗作渷。

沇字的起名意思

沇水，古河名，济水的别称，源出河南省，流经山东入渤海。

沇
Basic explanation of words
沇
yǎn
[沇水] Another name for Jishui, the name of the ancient river, originated from Henan Province, China, and flows through Shandong Province into the Bohai Sea.
沇
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǎn］
["Guangyun" is cut by turning, on the top, with. ]
(1) Water name. Another name for Jishui. It originated in Wangwu Mountain, Jiyuan County, Henan Province, and entered the Yellow River in Wen County. From Xingze, it returned to the south of the Yellow Henan and flowed east to Langhuai (now Guangrao County) in Shandong Province and into the Bohai Sea.
(2) Same as "Yan". Ancient state name.
(3) See "沇沇".
[②]［wěi］
["Jiyun" is more water-cut, the purpose is, to. ]
See "沇2melt".
沇
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　沇; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 610 04
[Ancient text] Along [Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? To turn and cut, sound Yan. Water name. [Said the text] Water flows out of Wangwu Mountain in East Wall of the Hedong River. 【Book·Yugong】The Taoist water flows eastward for the benefit. [Shanhaijing] The water flows northwest, and it is noted in Qinze. [Note] The sound of Zhen Yan is similar, and the sound is also sloppy. [Water Jingzhu] Jishui Path was originally south of the city, east to north, turbulent flow to southeast, divided into two waters. A water flows southeast, commonly known as Yanshui, 卽沇水 also.　Yu Dong, popular appearance. [Pre-Han · Jiao Si Song] Miao Miao Si Sai.　And Yantong again. [Gan's Star Classics] Yanzhou is called Yuanzhou. [Previous Han·Astronomy] Jiao Kangdi, Liuzhou.　[Jiyun] Yu Zhunqie, Yin Yin. The same meaning.　The water cut again, only the sound. Miryo, water flow 㵎Yanakaya. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Liu Rong Yin Wan.　【Ji Yun】or from Yan Zuo.

沇
Name meaning
Yeshui, the name of the ancient river, another name for Jishui, originated from Henan Province and flows through Shandong into the Bohai Sea.
yǎn
собств.
1) ист., геогр. (сокр. вм. 沇水) Яньшуй (название нескольких рек на террит. нынешних пров. Шаньдун и Хэнань)
2) геогр. (сокр. вм. 沇水) Яньшуй (приток Хуанхэ, на террит. пров. Шаньси)
3) ист., геогр. вм. 兖 (сокр. вм. 沇州) Яньчжоу (одна из 9 областей древнего Китая)
